title: To preserve the East-India trade
author: Neale, Thomas, d. 1699?
publisher: printed by Freeman Collins in the Old Baily,
notes: This edition dated and signed at end: Oct. 10. 1695. T. Neale. However, Neale's authorship has been questioned; cf. Poems on affairs of state Augustan satirical verse, 1660-1714, v.5. p.492.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
